content.rendered: Hill is running to take on the entrenched special interests and the corrupt system holding our state and our nation back — because Hill knows that Michigan deserves a truly independent Senator who will do what’s right for all of us, not just the wealthy few. This isn’t the campaign that will have the most endorsements from DC insiders, but it is the campaign focused on people and the issues that matter to all of us.
